quoteText:
If we reasonably determine that the security of our Services or infrastructure may be compromised due to hacking attempts, denial of service attacks, or other malicious activities, we may temporarily suspend the Services and we will take action to promptly resolve any security issues.
We will notify you of any suspension or other action taken for security reasons.
title: User suspension from the service will be fair and proportionate.

tosdr.case: User suspension from the service will be fair and proportionate.
